price: So leave them to engage in their falsehood and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised;
arabic: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُواْ وَيَلۡعَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
